text:
e="preserve">Zeki Ergezen (2 December 1949 – 2 October 2020) was a Turkish politician. He was a founding member of the Justice and Development Party. He was the Minister of Public Works and Housing from 2002 to 2005 in the Abdullah Gül and Recep Tayyip Erdogan cabinet.
Ergezen died on 2 October 2020 in Ankara from cancer at the age of 70.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Public Works and Housing
